body:
@josharian your proposal seems to solve the separate compilation issue I have with the current proposal. But I think it should be generalized, i.e. done at the package level instead of the package object level.

It's in the same spirit that I formulated my counter-proposal: it doesn't aliases objects but copy them.
See here: https://github.com/golang/go/issues/16339#issuecomment-235740256

It may indeed require some kind of compiler directive but I'd rather it wasn't a build tag lookalike.
I've also tried to describe the refactoring workflow required.
